attributes.action: Grant EMA (education mantinance allowance) to all students?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ema is only currently granted to students if their parents earn under £30,000, but just because some parents earn more it doesnt mean that those students get money from thier family. Each student should get some money to contribute toward the cost of book ect.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Grant EMA (education mantinance allowance) to all students?"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15350.asp

Prime Minister's Office
